title: Smoke
description: He is a good guy at heart. She is a bad girl deep inside. When they meet, their worlds will be turned upside down.Claire Collins is a young writer with a shady past she’s trying to forget. Trust doesn’t come easy for her and she abandoned every hope at meeting “the one” and fall in love. That is until she stumbles upon charming Sebastian. Sebastian King conquered the world of advertising and is always ready for the next war. He prides with being a bad guy, seducing and abandoning women. He won’t do relationship nor be tamed.Then he meets redhead Claire. She turns out to be as fiery as her hair and the transformation they go through is a journey where the destination is still unknown.Will they learn to trust each other or will the past be stronger than what might be.Warning! This book contains language and certain scenes appropriate for mature audience. 18 +This is the first book from Beyond Trilogy and cannot be read as a standalone.
author: S.D. Mary
